header.title: Embed Barcodes in {{FileFormatUp}} Pages Using {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Add barcodes of popular formats to any position in your business documents with {{ProdFullName}}. Our solution provides extensive options to customize barcode signatures.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is an advanced signing solution that supports a wide range of signature types. You can sign documents with text, images, barcodes, digital certificates, stamps, and more across 60+ file formats, including PDF, MS Office, images, ZIP files, and other popular business formats. Additionally, signatures in signed documents can be searched, verified, modified, or deleted at any time.

formats.title: Sign Documents in Other Formats
formats.description: Over 60 formats can be signed using our {{EnvName}} API. Apply various signatures to any page or position within the document.

more_features.title: Enhance or Protect Document Content with Signatures
more_features.description: The {{ProdFullName}} library is designed for signing and further processing popular file formats. Quickly and easily add, modify, verify, or delete various types of signatures.

feature_1.title: Document Signing
feature_1.content: Sign any page of supported documents with text, images, barcodes, QR codes, or stamps. Add hidden metadata like EXIF in images or protect document content from unauthorized changes using digital certificates.

feature_2.title: Signature Search and Verification
feature_2.content: Thereâ€™s much more you can do with a signed document. We offer verification of signatures to ensure everything is in order. Additionally, you can retrieve a list of all document signatures through a search.

feature_3.title: Modify Signatures
feature_3.content: Most previously added signatures can be modified. Easily correct text, adjust position, or change color.

feature_4.title: Delete Signatures
feature_4.content: Our solution supports full CRUD operations for signatures. Many types of signatures can be deleted from a document when necessary.
